blogPost.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
blogPost.body: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
blogPost.title: Ponder - Daily journal from your new tab
blogPost.author: Nick Abouzeid

localize.description: Ponder引导你在新的标签页上完成每日日记。有了自我反思的提示、快速键盘快捷键、美学背景和私人存储的条目，你只需专注于写作--Ponder 会处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 从您的新标签页的每日日记

localize.description: Ponder引導你在新的標籤頁上完成每日日記。有了自我反思的提示、快速鍵盤快捷鍵、美學背景和私人存儲的條目，你只需專注於寫作--Ponder 會處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 從您的新標籤頁的每日日記

previous.excerpt: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (💰, 🚗, 🏠,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!
previous.title: Worth it - Keeping track of your money, the simple way

localize.description: 如果一想到钱就头疼，那你就来对地方了。Worth it在这里让它变得尽可能简单，只需列出你的资产余额（💰，🚗，🏠，.），并按自己的节奏更新。今天就下载iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追踪你的钱，简单的方法

localize.description: 如果一想到錢就頭疼，那你就來對地方了。Worth it在這裏讓它變得儘可能簡單，只需列出你的資產餘額（💰，🚗，🏠，.），並按自己的節奏更新。今天就下載iOS和Android版吧
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的錢，簡單的方法

next.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
next.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。
